name: MS Jira Dark Theme
description: This is a dark theme for Jira, designed based around the usage of Mercy Ships. THIS IS NOT COMPLETE. I am working on parts as I use them, however most parts of Jira that Mercy Ships utilizes have been complete.
additional_info:
2.2:
 - General color fixes
 + Added Tempo areas

2.1:
 - General color fixes
 # Global color changes, Global carrot change
 + Added some missing pages

2.0:
 + most remaining pages in Jira that MS utilizes.
 / Major color revamps, including background color changes
 - minor tweaks to font colors
 - replaced most blue text with white/grey text, so as not to confuse hyperlinks

1.1:
 + search page added
  - minor tweaks to font colors
